initial_message_3: Located in Santa Catarina - Brazil, I'm focused, curious and passionate about technology.
about_me_text_1: My career started in 2021, when I decided to invest in an old dream, web development.
about_me_text_2: I am an easy going person, with a lot of willingness to learn and contribute.
about_me_text_3: I am currently studying for a degree in Systems Analysis and Development.
about_me_text_4: I'm fluent in Portuguese, Spanish and English.
